review: well crafted story. rich lad choosing a poor girl as his bride. cinderella meets her prince charming. however the evil mother over here is the girl's former scheming murderous boyfriend. all misunderstandings cleared at the end. lovers unite. excellent movie. shot in a cruise liner and exotic location. must watch.

hello, i really enjoyed this film humraaz. very good performance from akshaye khanna, bobby deol, and amisha patel. also, the music was just awesome. songs like sanam mere humraaz, pyar kar, and dil me karliya are very melodious.

akshaye khanna is the show stealer, whole movie belong to him his acting skills is just next level he is master of all the genres and the movie's storyline and direction is also very good, perfect movie for those who love thrill and suspense
